Updated November     pm



Halle Bailey thinks it is  to be young and in love PERIOD

The 23yearold singerandactress is smitten with boyfriend Darryl Dwayne Granberry Jr. aka DDG and is enjoying being able to  with the musician who she has been dating for over a year PERIOD

Asked about her boyfriend the Little Mermaid actress said I think whats really cool about love and being young is that you could just live and have a good time PERIOD But my personal life is something I keep sacred.puppy love experienceAll musical inspiration really just comes from life experiences PERIOD Love has been a really big one for me too because thats something Im experiencing for the first time and its like whoa in your brain PERIOD Its just fireworks a spark for creativity PERIOD



Halle shot to fame alongside her sister Chloe Bailey when their YouTube channel attracted the attention of Ellen DeGeneres back in  and the Angel singer can understand why people feel  of her because they feel they have known her for so long PERIOD

She said Part of me thinks thats a beautiful thing to know that you have that support from people and they just want to see good things happen to you PERIOD But its also really easy for us to comment on what other people are doing.. PERIOD to say a lot of stuff PERIOD I think the transition will continue to happen naturally PERIOD Its on people to figure it out not necessarily on me. originally published on celebretainment.com part of the BLOX Digital Content Exchange PERIOD
